name: Elven (DEMO)
description:
Just a little demo of a fantasy RPGMaker game I'm making. Don't expect anything spectacular yet.

I don't know what the fate of this project will be, but I'm optimistic about it!

Available on Windows and Mac

ALSO THIS IS A VERY VERY VERY EARLY VERSION OF THE GAME

the art will change a lot there's no way I'm just using the rpgmaker generator (hopefully lol)
